Detailed Description

Reading and writing of BED files.

See http://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/help/customTrack.html

Function Documentation

void gff_print_bed (  FILE *  OUTF,
GFF_Set *  gff,
int  use_groups
) 
 

Write a GFF_Set in BED format.

Parameters:
OUTF  Output stream
gff  Set to be printed
use_groups  If TRUE, all members of a group are described by a single line in the BED file (12-column format); if FALSE, any groups are ignored and each feature gets its own line. Features must already be grouped if use_groups == TRUE.
